/notes/Computer-Vision.title: Computer Vision
/notes/Computer-Vision.content:
# Hybrid Images

[GitlabsðŸ”—](https://git.soton.ac.uk/ik1g19/visioncw2)

This coursework involved merging high and low frequencies from different images using Java and OpenIMAJ to create Hybrid images, where lower frequencies become more prominent at distance and higher frequencies at close range.

![[notes/Images/hybrid_image.jpg]]

![[notes/Images/hybrid_image.jpg|100]]

/notes/Distributed-Systems-and-Networks.title: Distributed Systems and Networks
/notes/Distributed-Systems-and-Networks.content:
# Java Sockets

[GitlabsðŸ”—](https://git.soton.ac.uk/ik1g19/javanetworkprogramming/-/tree/master)

This first coursework documents my experience of using Java Sockets to learn how to send messages using TCP and UDP, as well as file sending.

# Distributed File Storage

[GitlabsðŸ”—](https://git.soton.ac.uk/ik1g19/distributed-systems-cw)

This second coursework involved building a distributed file storage system in Java.
